source.0eced932:
# sample_submission.csv

One of the unique points of this competition is that there are a lot of target valueables. We are asked to predict 206 valuables for each data in test dataset.
source.d0e5b372:
# train_targets_nonscored.csv

As described in [Data](https://www.kaggle.com/c/lish-moa/data), we have additional informations only for train dataset. It seems that this is one of the key points to make the difference from other participants.
source.39abefc1:
# train_features and test_features

There are 2 main csv. The shape of train_features is (23814, 876), this means that train_features contains 23814 data with 876 features.
